mapper.sql: t_house_support_facilities.id, t_house_support_facilities.type_id AS typeId, t_house_support_facilities.title, t_house_support_facilities.icon
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_support_facilities.* FROM t_house_support_facilities WHERE t_house_support_facilities.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_support_facilities.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_support_facilities
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_support_facilities.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_support_facilities.type_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.typeId},'%')
AND t_house_support_facilities.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.title},'%')
AND t_house_support_facilities.icon LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.icon},'%')
AND t_house_support_facilities.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_support_facilities.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
